about_the_game:
Welcome to Two Doors, a gripping horror game that tests your powers of observation and your nerves. In this thrilling nightmare, you repeatedly return to the same dark, dimly lit environment that subtly changes. Your goal: to discover if anything in this room has changed - anomalies that could drive you insane.

As you break the silence to observe the details, a painting may have shifted, a piece of furniture might be missing, or a shadow could suddenly take on a menacing shape. It is your task to identify these changes, as a malevolent presence seems to have a hand in these alterations, trying to lead you astray.

At the end of the room, you are faced with two doors. If you have discovered an anomaly, choose the right door to move forward. If everything appears unchanged, take the left door. But beware: a wrong choice could lead you deeper into the darkness and into the clutches of the creatures lurking in the shadows.

After each decision, you find yourself back on the upper floor, starting your eerie journey anew, always searching for the key to escape.

Can you break free from the endless loop and uncover the mystery of the anomalies? Your fate depends on your ability to distinguish the uncanny from the ordinary. Immerse yourself in Two Doors and face the horror hidden in seemingly harmless changes.

Gameplay

You start on the upper floor of a house, and your only option is to go downstairs and choose between two doors.

Pay attention to any anomalies.

If you notice anomalies, go through the right door.

If you don’t notice any anomalies, go through the left door.

You keep ending up on the upper floor. It feels like you’re trapped.
However, with each correct decision, time moves forward, and you get closer to the real exit.

You can choose between 2 difficulty levels.

Play Time

20-90 minutes

content_descriptors.notes: In some scenes, blood is shown in the form of static textures. Occasionally, a creepy figure appears, or you hear a loud knocking. The atmosphere is generally eerie.

name: Two Doors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Trapped in an endless loop within a haunted mansion, your only escape lies in your ability to notice subtle changes and survive terrifying encounters. Test your observation skills and steel your nerves in this intense horror experience. Will you choose the right door and break the cycle?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Bulgarian*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Czech*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Azerbaijani*, Assamese*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Cherokee*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Igbo*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Kyrgyz*, Konkani*, Croatian*, K'iche'*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Macedonian*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Yoruba*, Zulu*, Xhosa*
